text: La Luna also known as Luna is a 1979 Italian-American drama movie directed by Bernardo Bertolucci and starring Jill Clayburgh, Matthew Barry, Veronica Lazar, Tomas Milian, Renato Salvatori, Fred Gwynne, Peter Eyre, Roberto Benigni. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * Category:1979 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:Italian drama movies Category:Movies directed by Bernardo Bertolucci Category:Movies set in Rome
title: La Luna (movie)
